page.title: 05HOME LIFE
page.content: 9am Sunday I was woken by my cat Lucky jumping on my bed. I dressed in my black and yellow tracksuit and black shoes. I had a slice of bread spread with peanut butter for breakfast. After breakfast I mended the puncture on my bike and went to the BMX ramp at the Co_op park. There was a big hole in it so I went home. At 10.30am I cycled to church where I am a chorister. The priest was ordained by the Bishop of Colchester. He received a bible and a stole. At 12.30pm it was finished. I went home for dinner, pork broad beans, Yorkshire pudding and new potatoes. I played baseball with my friends and a Spanish girl. For tea I had toasted baked bean sandwiches. Church again at 6.30pm. and home for a cup of hot chocolate and bed at 8.30pm.
